title: Axiom
description: ***FOR FANS OF THE SUMMONED SERIES.***Fifteen year old Dimitri's life changes when his father is murdered, causing him to inherit a family curse. Now he's left at the mercy of rules he doesn't understand and the sinister side of people he thought he knew. Forced to commit crimes that increase in severity, Dimitri struggles to find his place in a world where he doesn't exist. AXIOM is a 15,000 word companion novella for readers of the SUMMONED series, following Dimitri's descent into the genie-bond.
author: Rainy Kaye
